name: The Little Honey Badger
short-description: The Little Honey Badger And the Mysteries of Bitcoin
description:
"The Little Honey Badger and the Mysteries of Bitcoin" is a captivating story
that introduces young readers to the complex world of Bitcoin in a fun and accessible way.
Through the adventures of the little Honey Badger, you will discover the fundamentals of Bitcoin, blockchain, and the principles of digital security, while developing your curiosity and spirit of exploration.
